creator: Voodle, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
We all use short video, so why not at work? Voodle is the short video app for business. Teams use Voodle to capture, share and discover important business moments as they happen. It’s the fastest and most effective way to connect teams with information that drives action across the organization.

Short video captures the context and emotion of a message so nothing gets lost in translation, like text. And, there’s no video conferencing fatigue – simply hit record and sixty seconds is all it takes to keep your team productive and in sync.

Voodle is the future of work. Help your team quickly share and discover important information so they can make more informed decisions faster, no matter where they work – home, office, or on the road.

Capture: You can record a customer moment, feature release, account updates, team wins, and more with the tap of a button.

• Super quick: tap to start and stop recording

• Express yourself wherever you are; Voodle is mobile-first

• Title with short descriptions, add hashtags

Share: In an instant, you can share those important moments with a few people or many, across the places work gets done most.

• Post instantly and securely to your channels

• With the click of a button, share voodles across applications like Salesforce, Hubspot, Slack

• Transcription and subtitling are immediately available for detailed context or copy and paste

• Comment on voodles you watch, sharing praise or adding a follow-up question

• Switch between teams all from one account

Watch: Watch voodles when and where it's best for you

• User-controlled playback options: speed, transcriptions, subtitles, highlight reels and more

• Transcriptions provide easy scanning and jump navigation

• Watch on the Voodle mobile or web apps

Smart Discovery: Use Voodle’s AI-powered search to find the information most relevant to you or sit back to watch a summary reel.

• AI-driven queries to surface highlights for you

• Quickly see the most interesting content by user reactions

• Get the lay of the land with trending topics or most loved videos

It’s easy to get started using Voodle. Simply create a team then make and share voodles with your colleagues, team, or the entire organization.

Voodle is invented for the new workplace. Keep your team in sync. Try it today!

creator: Voodle, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
We make and share short videos in our personal lives, so why not at work? Voodle is THE async short video messaging tool built for the next generation of business.

Stop relying on synchronous video meetings and instead try async video chats and posts. Protect your time and productivity at work, enable new options for employee engagement, and start building relationships with engaging video messages.

Use video messaging in your communication tech stack to share moments that matter with clients, teammates, investors, and more with a single link. Get started for free!


WHO CAN VOODLE?

Anyone and everyone! With a click, communicate with the clarity and speed of video. Plus, every voodle includes an automatically generated transcript. Motivate and inspire others while moving business decisions along faster with video chat for work.


WHAT CAN YOU VOODLE?

Use async video to enrich chats between you and one other person, or through a group post to as many people as you want (even from different organizations). Try stand-ups, shout-outs, brainstorming sessions, job postings, new hire onboarding activities and more with short video messaging. They say a picture is worth 1000 words — can you imagine what a short video is worth?


WHERE CAN YOU VOODLE?

We make/share short videos in our personal lives, so why not at work? Voodle is THE async short video messaging tool built for the next generation of business.

Instead of relying on synchronous video meetings, try async video chats & posts. This relationship-based video messaging platform connects you with the candidates, clients, colleagues, & collaborators who keep your business moving.

Wins at work require trusted connections, but leaning on parades of zoom calls & feverish email follow-ups to build rapport quickly snowballs into burnout & weak ties. Level up your tech stack & share moments that matter with clients, teammates, investors, & more with a single link.

WHO CAN VOODLE?
Anyone & everyone! With a click, communicate with the clarity & speed of video. Plus, voodles includes automatically generated transcripts. Motivate & inspire others while moving business decisions along faster with video chat for work.

WHAT CAN YOU VOODLE?
Use async video to enrich chats between you & one other person, or through a group post to as many people as you want (even from different orgs). Do stand-ups, shout-outs, brainstorming sessions, job postings, new hire onboarding & more with short video messaging. They say a picture is worth 1000 words — imagine what a short video is worth!

WHERE CAN YOU VOODLE?
Record & share wherever your conversations are already happening​. Record a voodle from any mobile device or desktop web browser – we’re native-built for each device! Bonus: you can even upload video later if you’re off wifi.

WHEN CAN YOU VOODLE?
Create or enjoy voodles whenever & wherever it's best for you. In a hurry? Watch at 2X speed! Async communication protects your time at work & is on-hand & ready whenever inspiration strikes.

HOW CAN YOU VOODLE?
It’s simple to start voodling. Open the app on your device or web browser to begin with a few clicks. We keep things super quick & search-friendly with titles, short descriptions, & hashtags.

WHY PEOPLE VOODLE
Here are some examples of why savvy professionals use Voodle:
• Hiring managers source top talent through dynamic job postings that include business-friendly short videos
• Strategic collaborators keep each other informed of top priorities & updates via async standups vs not-so-quick “quick check-in’s”
• Distributed teams keep employee engagement up across time zones & build strong company culture by sharing wins, kudos, & memorable moments with the personal touch of video
• Field sales managers capture real-time insights for HQ & hold vendors accountable with context-rich details of video
• Events managers, construction coordinators, consultants, coaches, & more keep their clients, teams, & subs updated & satisfied with short video messages

VOODLE FOR HIRING, A USE CASE DEEP DIVE:
Hiring managers & recruiters found tons of value & applications for Voodle throughout the hiring process. Using Voodle’s short async video as a recruitment tool, they:
• Stood out in the war for talent with video enriched job posts
• Saved time screening candidates by using async video instead of a synchronous call
• Preserved & quickly solicited authentic candidate feedback from the hiring committee post-interview
• Closed top talent by showing how much they matter with personal videos from the entire team
Improved onboarding & deepened connection with new hires using async video intros
• Accelerated team building & “trust-forming” human connection with personal moments that gave candidates & hiring teams a chance to see & be seen
• Protected individual flexibility with async video – fewer meetings = happier people

Use async video chat to get work done whether you work on your own or with remote, hybrid or distributed teammates sprawled across the globe. Short asynchronous video messaging can reinforce agency & unlock agility without sacrificing authenticity in your work.

It’s easy: Download, Capture & Share - for free!
